segments.text: I see the woman focused on her dish, completely absorbed in the task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can’t help but notice water cascading over the sink, pooling on the floor beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in a puddle, seemingly unaware of the mess growing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to something mischievous, and I feel a rush of excitement at their audacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she will ever notice the chaos unfolding just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is teetering on that stool, and I can't shake the feeling that he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him looks eager, waiting for her cookie with wide eyes, and I feel a tightening in my chest.
segments.speaker: PAR
